sources.title: Laser Mission
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: Laser Mission (1989)
sources.description: A CIA agent is sent to get Professor Braun before the KGB can seize him as the Prof's knowledge, together with a recently stolen diamond, could be used to make a laser cannon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/laser-mission-1989/

metadata.Plot: Mercenary Gold is sent from the CIA to seize the laser expert Braun in Cuba, before the KGB catches him. A recently stolen giant diamond could be used together with Braun's knowledge to construct a laser cannon which could bring power over the whole world. Who will succeed: CIA or KGB - or none of them?
metadata.Actors: Brandon Lee, Debi A. Monahan, Ernest Borgnine
metadata.Country: West Germany, South Africa, United States
